parameters.subject: Action Required: Payment Failed for Invoice {{ $json.invoiceNumber }}
parameters.html:
=

Payment Failed

We were unable to process your payment for invoice {{ $json.invoiceNumber }}.

Amount Due: ${{ $json.amount }}

Reason: {{ $json.failureReason }}

Please update your payment method or try again:

Pay Invoice Now

If you have questions, please contact us.

Download PDF Receipt

Thank you for your business!
